StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOrdersView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int = 0, @OrdersRequestStatusID int, @GenderCode char(1), @ProgramCodes varchar(200), --pipe-separated string, es.mated max length = 36 @ProgramTypeCodes varchar(50), --pipe-separated string, es.mated max length = 10 @ProgramFiscalYear int, @ProgramClass varchar(20), @ProgramIncrement int, @SortColumnNumber int, @ColumnSortOrder bit = 1, @startRowIndex int, @maximumRows int, @maxTotalRowsToSort int ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED declare @totalrows int declare @isOrgOnlySearch bit declare @isOCSClassSearch bit
if @ProgramIncrement is null and @ProgramClass is null and @ProgramFiscalYear is null set @isOCSClassSearch = 0 else set @isOCSClassSearch = 1
--Since most common search is by org only, we make that speedy if @OrdersRequestStatusID is null and @GenderCode is null and @ProgramCodes is null and @ProgramTypeCodes is null and @isOCSClassSearch = 0 set @isOrgOnlySearch = 1 else set @isOrgOnlySearch = 0
--Get all subordinate organiza.ons for the @OrgID declare @SubordinateOrgs as TABLE ( OrgID int ) insert into @SubordinateOrgs (OrgID) values (@OrgID) insert into @SubordinateOrgs select OSS from [usmc].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] where HQ = @OrgID and OSS is not null insert into @SubordinateOrgs select OSS from [usmc].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] where Region = @OrgID and OSS is not null insert into @SubordinateOrgs select OSS from [usmc].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] where District = @OrgID and OSS is not null insert into @SubordinateOrgs select OSS from [usmc].[vwRecrui.ngOrgIDs] where RS = @OrgID and OSS is not null
--Get all NWAIDs with class records matching @ProgramClass, @ProgramFilter, @ProgramFiscalYear declare @NWAsInSpeci.edClasses as TABLE ( NWA_ID int ) if (@isOCSClassSearch = 1) insert into @NWAsInSpeci.edClasses select NWA_ID from OCS, OCS_CLASS where OCS.OCS_CLASS_ID = OCS_CLASS.CLASS_ID and (OCS_CLASS.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE = @ProgramClass or @ProgramClass is null) and (OCS_CLASS.FISCAL_YEAR = @ProgramFiscalYear or @ProgramFiscalYear is null) and (OCS_CLASS.CLASS_NUMBER = @ProgramIncrement or @ProgramIncrement is null)
--Get the count. Split out speedy OrgOnly search. IF @isOrgOnlySearch = 1 BEGIN SELECT @totalrows = COUNT(*) FROM [USMC].[ORDERS_REQUEST] ordersRequest INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] nwa on ordersRequest.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc on nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID in (SELECT OrgID from @SubordinateOrgs) END ELSE BEGIN --Less speedy. We want the count so that we can know whether or not sor.ng/paging will cripple the search SELECT @totalrows = COUNT(*) FROM [USMC].[ORDERS_REQUEST] ordersRequest INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] nwa on ordersRequest.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_CONTRACT] contract on contract.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc on nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[NROTC_CONTRACT] nc on nc.CONTRACT_ID = contract.CONTRACT_ID WHERE nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID in (SELECT OrgID from @SubordinateOrgs) AND (mc.GENDER_CODE = @GenderCode OR @GenderCode is null) AND (ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID = @OrdersRequestStatusID or @OrdersRequestStatusID is null) AND (@ProgramCodes like '%|' + nwa.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE + '|%' or @ProgramCodes is null) AND (@ProgramTypeCodes like '%|' + CAST(nc.PROGRAM_TYPE as varchar(10)) + '|%' or @ProgramTypeCodes is null) AND ((nwa.NWA_ID in (select NWA_ID from @NWAsInSpeci.edClasses)) or @isOCSClassSearch = 0) END
--If no records, return quickly IF @totalrows = 0 RETURN ELSE --If count is less than @maxTotalRowsToSort, we'll sort and page. IF @totalrows < @maxTotalRowsToSort BEGIN declare @WorkingResultSet as TABLE ( ORDERS_REQUEST_ID int, NWA_ID int, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID int, FIRST_NAME varchar(100), MIDDLE_NAME varchar(20), LAST_NAME varchar(100), SSN varchar(15), RS varchar(45), OSS varchar(45), PROGRAM varchar(50), CLASS_TYPE varchar(20), GENDER_CODE varchar(1), STATUS varchar(40), DISPOSITION varchar(40), ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS varchar(20), ORDERS_REQUEST_DATE date.me, ORDERS_GENERATED_DATE date.me, ORDERS_TYPE varchar(20), ORDERS_CANCELLED_DATE date.me, ORDERS_COMPLETED_DATE date.me )
--remember org-only search is split out for speed IF @isOrgOnlySearch = 1 BEGIN INSERT INTO @WorkingResultSet SELECT ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_ID, nwa.NWA_ID, nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, person.FIRST_NAME, person.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME AS MIDDLE_NAME, person.LAST_NAME, person.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER as SSN, parents.NAME AS RS, ro.NAME as OSS, cc.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION as PROGRAM, usmc.GetClassTypeForOrders(nwa.NWA_ID) as CLASS_TYPE, mc.GENDER_CODE, sd.STATUS_DESCRIPTION as STATUS, sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION as DISPOSITION, ordersRequestStatus.DESCRIPTION as ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS, ordersRequest.REQUEST_DATE as ORDERS_REQUEST_DATE, ordersRequest.GENERATED_DATE as ORDERS_GENERATED_DATE, ot.DESCRIPTION as ORDERS_TYPE, ordersRequest.CANCELLED_DATE as ORDERS_CANCELLED_DATE, ordersRequest.COMPLETED_DATE as ORDERS_COMPLETED_DATE FROM [USMC].[ORDERS_REQUEST] ordersRequest INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] nwa on ordersRequest.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_CONTRACT] contract on contract.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc on nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] person on nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = person.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] ro on nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN (select ro.ORGANIZATION_ID, parent.NAME from RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro, ORGANIZATION_MAP om, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION parent where ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID and om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = parent.ORGANIZATION_ID union select ORGANIZATION_ID, SHORT_NAME as NAME from RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION where ORGANIZATION_ID = 910) parents on nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = parents.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].COMPONENT_CODE cc on nwa.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = cc.COMPONENT_CODE INNER JOIN [USMC].[ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS] ordersRequestStatus on ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID = ordersRequestStatus.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN (select NWA_ID, max(CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) as CURRENT_STATUS_ID FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS group by NWA_ID) csd on nwa.nwa_ID = csd.nwa_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] cs on nwa.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID and cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = csd.CURRENT_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[STATUS_DISPOSITION] sd ON cs.[STATUS_TYPE]=sd.[STATUS_TYPE] AND cs.[STATUS_CODE]=sd.[STATUS_CODE] AND cs.[DISPOSITION_CODE]=sd.[DISPOSITION_CODE] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[NROTC_CONTRACT] nc on nc.CONTRACT_ID = contract.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[ORDERS_TYPE] ot on ordersRequest.ORDERS_TYPE_ID = ot.ORDERS_TYPE_ID WHERE nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID in (SELECT OrgID from @SubordinateOrgs)
END ELSE --not "just by org" search BEGIN INSERT INTO @WorkingResultSet SELECT ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_ID, nwa.NWA_ID, nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, person.FIRST_NAME, person.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME AS MIDDLE_NAME, person.LAST_NAME, person.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER as SSN, parents.NAME AS RS, ro.NAME as OSS, cc.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION as PROGRAM, usmc.GetClassTypeForOrders(nwa.NWA_ID) as CLASS_TYPE, mc.GENDER_CODE, sd.STATUS_DESCRIPTION as STATUS, sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION as DISPOSITION, ordersRequestStatus.DESCRIPTION as ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS, ordersRequest.REQUEST_DATE as ORDERS_REQUEST_DATE, ordersRequest.GENERATED_DATE as ORDERS_GENERATED_DATE, ot.DESCRIPTION as ORDERS_TYPE, ordersRequest.CANCELLED_DATE as ORDERS_CANCELLED_DATE, ordersRequest.COMPLETED_DATE as ORDERS_COMPLETED_DATE FROM [USMC].[ORDERS_REQUEST] ordersRequest INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] nwa on ordersRequest.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_CONTRACT] contract on contract.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc on nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] person on nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = person.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] ro on nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN (select ro.ORGANIZATION_ID, parent.NAME from RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro, ORGANIZATION_MAP om, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION parent where ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID and om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = parent.ORGANIZATION_ID union select ORGANIZATION_ID, SHORT_NAME as NAME from RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION where ORGANIZATION_ID = 910) parents on nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = parents.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].COMPONENT_CODE cc on nwa.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = cc.COMPONENT_CODE INNER JOIN [USMC].[ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS] ordersRequestStatus on ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID = ordersRequestStatus.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN (select NWA_ID, max(CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) as CURRENT_STATUS_ID FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS group by NWA_ID) csd on nwa.nwa_ID = csd.nwa_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] cs on nwa.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID and cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = csd.CURRENT_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[STATUS_DISPOSITION] sd ON cs.[STATUS_TYPE]=sd.[STATUS_TYPE] AND cs.[STATUS_CODE]=sd.[STATUS_CODE] AND cs.[DISPOSITION_CODE]=sd.[DISPOSITION_CODE] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[NROTC_CONTRACT] nc on nc.CONTRACT_ID = contract.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[ORDERS_TYPE] ot on ordersRequest.ORDERS_TYPE_ID = ot.ORDERS_TYPE_ID WHERE nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID in (SELECT OrgID from @SubordinateOrgs) AND (mc.GENDER_CODE = @GenderCode OR @GenderCode is null) AND (ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID = @OrdersRequestStatusID OR @OrdersRequestStatusID is null) AND (@ProgramCodes like '%|' + nwa.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE + '|%' or @ProgramCodes is null) AND (@ProgramTypeCodes like '%|' + CAST(nc.PROGRAM_TYPE as varchar(10)) + '|%' or @ProgramTypeCodes is null) AND ((nwa.NWA_ID in (select NWA_ID from @NWAsInSpeci.edClasses)) or @isOCSClassSearch = 0) END
--use the working result set (generated by the recruiter or non-recruiter branches) to get correct sort and page SELECT @totalrows AS TotalRows, ORDERS_REQUEST_ID, NWA_ID, ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_NAME, LAST_NAME, SSN, RS, OSS, PROGRAM, CLASS_TYPE, GENDER_CODE, STATUS, DISPOSITION, ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS, ORDERS_REQUEST_DATE, ORDERS_GENERATED_DATE, ORDERS_TYPE, ORDERS_CANCELLED_DATE, ORDERS_COMPLETED_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY --NOTE THREE COLUMN SORT FOR SortColumnNumber 1 CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 THEN LAST_NAME END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 THEN LAST_NAME END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 THEN FIRST_NAME END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 THEN FIRST_NAME END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 THEN MIDDLE_NAME END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 THEN MIDDLE_NAME END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 2 THEN SSN END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 2 THEN SSN END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 3 THEN RS END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 3 THEN RS END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 4 THEN OSS END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 4 THEN OSS END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 5 THEN PROGRAM END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 5 THEN PROGRAM END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 6 THEN CLASS_TYPE END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 6 THEN CLASS_TYPE END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 7 THEN GENDER_CODE END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 7 THEN GENDER_CODE END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 8 THEN STATUS END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 8 THEN STATUS END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 9 THEN DISPOSITION END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 9 THEN DISPOSITION END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 10 THEN ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 10 THEN ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 11 THEN ORDERS_REQUEST_DATE END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 11 THEN ORDERS_REQUEST_DATE END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 12 THEN ORDERS_GENERATED_DATE END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 12 THEN ORDERS_GENERATED_DATE END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 13 THEN ORDERS_TYPE END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 13 THEN ORDERS_TYPE END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 14 THEN ORDERS_COMPLETED_DATE END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 14 THEN ORDERS_COMPLETED_DATE END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 15 THEN ORDERS_CANCELLED_DATE END END ASC, CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 15 THEN ORDERS_CANCELLED_DATE END END DESC,
CASE WHEN @ColumnSortOrder <> 0 and @ColumnSortOrder <> 1 and (@SortColumnNumber < 1 or @SortColumnNumber > 4) THEN LAST_NAME END ASC ) as RowNum, * FROM @WorkingResultSet ) as Orders WHERE @startRowIndex is null OR (RowNum BETWEEN @startRowIndex AND (@startRowIndex + @maximumRows) - 1) Order By RowNum END ELSE --too many rows for e.cient sor.ng and paging, so we just get the top page of unsorted records BEGIN SELECT TOP (@maximumrows) @totalrows AS TotalRows, ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_ID, nwa.NWA_ID, nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, person.FIRST_NAME, person.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME AS MIDDLE_NAME, person.LAST_NAME, person.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER as SSN, parents.NAME AS RS, ro.NAME as OSS, cc.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION as PROGRAM, usmc.GetClassTypeForOrders(nwa.NWA_ID) as CLASS_TYPE, mc.GENDER_CODE, sd.STATUS_DESCRIPTION as STATUS, sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION as DISPOSITION, ordersRequestStatus.DESCRIPTION as ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS, ordersRequest.REQUEST_DATE as ORDERS_REQUEST_DATE, ordersRequest.GENERATED_DATE as ORDERS_GENERATED_DATE, ot.DESCRIPTION as ORDERS_TYPE, ordersRequest.CANCELLED_DATE as ORDERS_CANCELLED_DATE, ordersRequest.COMPLETED_DATE as ORDERS_COMPLETED_DATE FROM [USMC].[ORDERS_REQUEST] ordersRequest INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] nwa on ordersRequest.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_CONTRACT] contract on contract.NWA_ID = nwa.NWA_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] mc on nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] person on nwa.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = person.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] ro on nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN (select ro.ORGANIZATION_ID, parent.NAME from RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro, ORGANIZATION_MAP om, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION parent where ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID and om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = parent.ORGANIZATION_ID union select ORGANIZATION_ID, SHORT_NAME as NAME from RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION where ORGANIZATION_ID = 910) parents on nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = parents.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].COMPONENT_CODE cc on nwa.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE = cc.COMPONENT_CODE INNER JOIN [USMC].[ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS] ordersRequestStatus on ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID = ordersRequestStatus.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN (select NWA_ID, max(CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) as CURRENT_STATUS_ID FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS group by NWA_ID) csd on nwa.nwa_ID = csd.nwa_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] cs on nwa.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID and cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = csd.CURRENT_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[STATUS_DISPOSITION] sd ON cs.[STATUS_TYPE]=sd.[STATUS_TYPE] AND cs.[STATUS_CODE]=sd.[STATUS_CODE] AND cs.[DISPOSITION_CODE]=sd.[DISPOSITION_CODE] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[NROTC_CONTRACT] nc on nc.CONTRACT_ID = contract.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[ORDERS_TYPE] ot on ordersRequest.ORDERS_TYPE_ID = ot.ORDERS_TYPE_ID WHERE nwa.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID in (SELECT OrgID from @SubordinateOrgs) AND (mc.GENDER_CODE = @GenderCode OR @GenderCode is null) AND (ordersRequest.ORDERS_REQUEST_STATUS_ID = @OrdersRequestStatusID OR @OrdersRequestStatusID is null) AND (@ProgramCodes like '%|' + nwa.OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE + '|%' or @ProgramCodes is null) AND (@ProgramTypeCodes like '%|' + CAST(nc.PROGRAM_TYPE as varchar(10)) + '|%' or @ProgramTypeCodes is null) AND ((nwa.NWA_ID in (select NWA_ID from @NWAsInSpeci.edClasses)) or @isOCSClassSearch = 0) END
